attributes.action: Refund Uni students for fees paid during COVID as learning has been impacted
attributes.additional_details: University students has been given no leniency within pandemic guidance yet have been affected dramatically and unlike a levels/gcse students we are paying for our education!
attributes.background: Refund students who have paid tuition fees in 2020/2021 as we have received sub standard learning due to strikes jan-March 2020 and then pandemic March 2020-ongoing so have not had the academic learning we were paying for.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require Universities to partially refund tuition fees for 19/20 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550738

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
